name: tee-data
description: Package in charge of storing and building TEE datasets

scripts.build-json-output: npx ts-node src/generateProgramType.ts && npx ts-node src/buildJsonOutput.ts
scripts.build-json-output-watch: npx ts-node src/generateProgramType.ts && npx concurrently "nodemon src/generateProgramType.ts --ignore *.d.ts -e ts,yaml" "nodemon src/buildJsonOutput.ts -e ts,yaml"

author: Julien Paris & Pierre Camilleri
